testimonials.name: Banasree
testimonials.testimonial: Working with DewCo means working at the idea stage — before things even exist. Dipankar constantly explores new concepts, and I help research, validate, and shape them into workable directions. From early-stage SaaS ideas to in-house product research, the collaboration is always creative, structured, and forward-thinking.
testimonials.founder_note: Banasree has been a constant support in research and ideation, especially while building and validating fresh SaaS concepts and internal products.

testimonials.name: Ayushi
testimonials.testimonial: DewCo is not just about execution, it’s about storytelling. I’ve worked closely with Dipankar on content strategy, social media, and branding — both for client projects and in-house SaaS products. The clarity of vision makes content creation meaningful and aligned.
testimonials.founder_note: Ayushi always stays by my side when it comes to content, social presence, and research for new ideas — across client work and DewCo’s own products.

testimonials.name: Nitish
testimonials.testimonial: Through Gloventis Solutions and DewCo, I’ve worked on multiple SEO and marketing initiatives. Dipankar’s approach is very data-driven and practical. We’ve collaborated on multiple projects together, bringing real results for clients.
testimonials.founder_note: Nitish has helped bring in multiple projects and has worked extensively on SEO and marketing across many client engagements.

testimonials.name: Kusum
testimonials.role: Freelance Product Development, Project Management & UI/UX Designer
testimonials.testimonial: With DewCo, I’ve worked end-to-end — from UI/UX design to managing client communication and delivery. We’ve built products from scratch, both for clients and internal SaaS ideas. The collaboration is highly structured yet creatively free.
testimonials.founder_note: Kusum plays a key role in design, project management, and client coordination — helping build products from zero to launch.

testimonials.name: Sagar Paul
testimonials.testimonial: DewCo represents years of shared vision and execution. Dipankar and I started Gloventis Solutions and WanderRest together, and we continue building multiple products — including in-house SaaS like TRAC App. The journey has always been about long-term value, not shortcuts.
testimonials.founder_note: Sagar and I dreamed and built Gloventis Solutions and WanderRest together. We continue working as long-term partners on SaaS and client products.

testimonials.name: Arnab
testimonials.testimonial: I’ve worked with Dipankar on several projects — both client-based and internal SaaS initiatives. His system-level thinking and product clarity make collaboration smooth and technically strong.
testimonials.founder_note: Arnab and I have worked together across freelance projects and in-house SaaS development, including collaborations from our previous company.

testimonials.name: Joydeb
testimonials.testimonial: DewCo feels like working with a peer, not a hierarchy. Dipankar and I collaborate as experienced engineers — discussing architecture, scalability, and long-term product direction. It’s always a knowledge-sharing environment.
testimonials.founder_note: Joydeb is a highly experienced developer who consistently guides, supports, and collaborates on complex projects and SaaS ideas.
